website_summaries.verdict: The Nintendo DS and DS Lite do a lot of things well, but Web browsing isn't one of them. Give this slow, Flashless Web browser a pass.
pros: Good presentation of non-Flash Web pages
fairly robust interface makes good use of touch screen and stylus

customer_reviews.title: memory pak fits big but works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Overall i am very happy with my nintendo ds browser. Nintendo memory expansion pak expirience: inatially i wanted the ds lite version memory expansion pak but got the ds original memory pak(fits a little big on my ds lite but it works perfectly nintendo ds browser works porfectly with my nintendo ds lite) Experience with the nintendo ds browser: The web pages runs slower but you cant expect much from the ds original or ds lite it also doesnt sport flash player but its not that important, however for reading web pages and seeing pictures is pretty decent and plus pages and pictures shows up very colorful. Thank nintendo and opera for releasing web browsing for our nintendo ds
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Works for the basics!
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting magic speeds, design brilliance, and the ability to watch Youtube videos, then you probably shouldn't be looking at this. However, in the absence of a smart phone or laptop, this device is more than adequate to check your e-mail, read the news, and maybe poke around on Facebook a little. They've created an interface that works quite well for the device, and that's what you need. (This is especially great for traveling, as then, if worse comes to worst, you can always play Pokemon during your two hour layover, time sitting during the rainforest's enthusiastic daily rain that made you reluctant to bring your laptop, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 0 stars if possible. I ordered it and received it quickly enough but it requires a memory expansion to work and the one I received didn't have it in the case. So a nice waste of money and time for me.
customer_reviews.author: KWeger

customer_reviews.title: Great implementation.  DS falls short.
customer_reviews.text: The software is stupendous, and would earn 5 stars on its own. Unfortunately for today's internet the DS just doesn't have the power you need. No flash is liveable, but the render times are crippling. If all you want to do is read the news and check your email this may be worth it. I switched my nytimes subscription to weekends only, and just read the weekday news on the ds now. Unfortunately that's about the limit of this device's usefulness. It's simply not practical for regular web surfing or reading link-ridden blogs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brzinski

customer_reviews.title: A little better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: After initial set-up issues were solved, I found the product to work better than I expected. I didn't think I would be able to view large web pages but have not had any problems. Some sites are unavailable but many are still accessable. It takes some getting used to the way it rearranges the layouts but not something that you can't get used to. I can easily view my personal website and was able to play around with Google maps. Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it works... BUT no flash support, no audio, no video, and very slow, so what's the point? My son was very disappointed that he can't watch You Tube videos or listen to music. The DS does not have the hardware to support any USEFUL internet browsing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crafton

customer_reviews.title: Great Browser for ds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Game from amazon. it came super fast. it is a great Browser for the ds lite. this Game allows you to surf the internet using your wifi connection. you can go on facebook Ebuddy Google and anysite you can think of. the only downside to this is that the loading time takes forever. Ebuddy is the only one that runs fast. But if you have time on you hands and want to wait for the loading this is the game for you. I Love this game. I hope this Helped. Take note. you need the Ds Exspansion pack, without it it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: American J

customer_reviews.title: The extremes are a bit silly...
customer_reviews.text: ...the moderate reviews are spot-on. The browser _is_ slow, sometimes frustratingly so. And it's a bit of a pain to use, as the display's smooshed and typing is a chore (though this may be common to other portable web devices). But if you already own a DS, this doodad gives you basic portable web access for thirty bucks, and that's a fair price in my book. This is a basic tool, not an entertainment device.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Stueber

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this 3 days earlier than i was suppose to get it which is good, the browser goes slow on major sites, but smaller sites work great.
customer_reviews.author: ksnod

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with my router
customer_reviews.text: I personally wasn't able to use this with my router as said router was too new.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Eustis

customer_reviews.title: only for old wifi
customer_reviews.text: will not work with WPA2 networks, only WEP almost all wifi routers nowadays are protected with WPA not WEP do not buy unless your using WEP secured wifi
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: its slow, but it works
customer_reviews.text: This browser works in a pinch. It's slow, and if you use windows live hotmail you will need to set it to the "Classic" setting or you will have a very long wait for your email. Clever use of the two screens to pan around the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Merch A. DeGrasse

customer_reviews.title: Very Productive
customer_reviews.text: I was very glad to get this. Yeah it may be out dated. But I use it everyday non-stop. Perfect for emails, facebook, and Evernote.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Peterson

customer_reviews.title: No Flash Player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this browser for my 9 year old who likes to play games on the internet. I did not realize that you could not download any of the flash players. It does work and you can look at web pages and do searches but I would not buy this for a young child. It is more for an older person who just wants to look at the news etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: so so.  iPhone probably better.
customer_reviews.text: NO YOU TUBE!!!! This is the biggest drawback to this browser. No apparent support for Flash. Other than that, it's pretty cool. Keep in mind that the DS is no dual core Pentium and even on ethernet, it runs pretty slow. Web pages load like dialup speed. Cool options for functionality but the slow loading is a drag. Shutting off images speeds things up but make it a little boring.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nakatsuka

customer_reviews.title: Like New Nintendo DS Browser
customer_reviews.text: I got the order earlier than expected. My daughter have enjoyed it since she took it out of the box. As long as my daughter is happy, then I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: MzIt

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have been happy if this browser could check my emails and faceboook. However it wont load so many pages, hotmail is one where it wont load the sign in page properly. Facebook it does a little better at however you can't send people mesages. Also some wifi connection it just says error and wont connect to. For example Virgin inflight wifi. Extremly unreliable, invest your money elseware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sudol

customer_reviews.title: Browser
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will. I you can check your email and stuff but for faster speed you can remove the images.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome little device for the ds....my wife loves it and it's a sinch to use. very reliable shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt have memory card!
customer_reviews.text: Did not contain the memory card and it won't work without it. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: R DIAMOND

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect if you know what to expect/how to use it properly
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with any sense should know your not going to be doing any heavy web browsing on the DS Lite , that said this works perfect for mobile version of most web sites ie facebook,gmail,espn,twitter,ign, etc... plus it only cost me $4 like new :)
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: this DS browser sucks!
customer_reviews.text: First off, i couldnt even use it at first. The person who I bought it from didnt bother to include the password to access the games browser. With some searches on youtube I was able to find out how to reset it. This didnt help much because I still couldnt use the stupid thing. IT keeps saying "unable to connect to network". I still havent been able to use it. Im getting rid of it!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Mead

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: It fits my crystal clear ds shell and really complements it. The only problem is the browser is old and unsupported by many websites but its great for YouTube lol
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: no cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the cartridge as it implied it would. So now i cant use the browser. So basically wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: jdm
customer_reviews.text: nothing wrong with product just couldn't do any thing with it because of location no free wifi and i got rid of ds for dsi
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan David Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Slower than a Blackberry browser
customer_reviews.text: This device is disappointingly slow - it's a device of last resort. If you have any other browsing device handy, such as a Blackberry browser, you will have a better browsing experience with that other device. This is not a device you will use at home either, because it's much faster to boot up your home computer and use IE or Firefox than to waste your time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game and service
customer_reviews.text: The game came in great condition in 4 days from cali and was as good as new. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: don'tt buy this product, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: this product is definitely not worth the money, i bought it months ago, and have never been able to figure it out what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Paige Klugherz

customer_reviews.title: Great little browser
customer_reviews.text: This browser works well on the Nintendo DS lite. Like other reviews have said, it can be a little slow, but there are some web sites, including: Amazon, USA Today, MSN, Yahoo, and Google, just to name a few that offer optimized smaller versions of their web sites that load quicker and easier for small screens like the DS and PDAs. Using the stylus is neat for clicking on links, and the touch screen keyboard that pops up for use when you need to enter information works well too. I think the added funtionality and portability that comes with the DS makes this a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: A Browser not a Game
customer_reviews.text: The Opera browser works well, however, having some game skills with the DS helps. It takes practice to get the right moves down so that you can reach a desired Web page, locate the portion you want the read, and get it into a readable format. For long waits at the airport it is probably worth it, I'm not so sure about quick lookups. But if you have to know that certain fact to win a bet, it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: R. Virkus

customer_reviews.title: SLOW BROWSING! BUT PRETTY HANDY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago after reading reviews on it. i never even knew ds had a browser!! this isnt a game its just a little browser...its not so bad its pretty slow but if you disable images its ok. also my tip is to go on mobile webpages...so that its formated fasted and better for this little opera browser. sucks no youtube and stuff but its ok. its just for checking mail. dont check your banking here cause it sucks and it might do something wrong. but reading storys and blogs its fun!!! worth it. (i guess..couldve been cheaper. like 15$ maybe)
customer_reviews.author: P. Abadsantos

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: it can be a bit slow, but what do you expect? it's certainly NOT a computer connection. It's very handy when you need something really quick and you don't feel like starting up your slow computer. if you disable images the website loads faster. there is no video, flash, or sounds, but it's meant to be a handy tool, not a computer replacer. websites like myspace are slow, where as things like email, google and other search engines are pretty quick. i definitely recommend this if you have a ds lite =)
customer_reviews.author: tttttttina

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, great to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo DS Lite Browser has become a very handy tool for me while traveling. I've seen many bad reviews about how it has no support for Flash and no video viewing. But honestly, it really isn't for surfing the internet for a long time! If you just need something to check your email while away, or short browsing of the internet while you are away from the computer, it is perfect! It allows you to disable images while loading a page which allows the page to load considerable faster! Its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: s.

customer_reviews.title: ds browser
customer_reviews.text: product performs as expected. not great speed with graphics but as quick as the internet connection will allow for text. it is a pretty neat program with limitations by ds. fun rating does not apply here. this is a working browser for your ds-lite.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Good for mobile browsing
customer_reviews.text: This browser will not replace your internet use on a normal PC. It does ok for regular internet browsing. I use it for browsing websites that are meant for mobile access (thus less multimedia content) and going to these websites is pretty quick and allows me to read stories, check sport scores, weather, etc without having to carry a laptop around the house. I believe most people already know this, but this requires a wireless access point (wireless router at home, an open wireless access point in a store or near a store).
customer_reviews.author: C. Leung

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises to do.
customer_reviews.text: The DS Browser does exactly what it says it will do. Pros: -Easy set-up -Modest loading times -Most websites accessable. Cons: -No Video support -No audio support If you have a wireless internet connection in your home, this is a fun little toy for your DS. I get bored sometimes and just browse Wikipedia or Myspace on my DS when I don't feel like getting on the computer. It could be better, but it could also be much worse.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mccleney

customer_reviews.title: there are better things than this
customer_reviews.text: a notebook that costs as much as a ds would be better and dsi dsxl and 3ds come with internet maybe crapier since it has less memery
customer_reviews.author: O. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Works to browse the Internet.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on a DS Lite and it works well to surf the internet. The drawbacks are that there is no option to download/save anything and some of the websites will appear as RSS feeds rather than a normal elaborate website with all of the bell and whistles. One issue with the DS and not necessarily the browser is that it can only connect to password protected Wi-Fi networks that use a WEP key and not WPA or WPA2.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wong

customer_reviews.title: Functional for occasional travel
customer_reviews.text: It's good enough for occasional travel to read emails if you don't want to bring a laptop. It works as advertised. I was not expecting much so I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to check the version of the browser you are getting! My boyfriend picked this up for me when it just came out, and unfortunately I discovered after opening it that it is for the DS Lite. I happen to have the old DS and the extra memory card that comes with the browser will not fit in the old style. (It is smaller, designed to fit flush in the Lite gameboy advance game slot.) You need the memory card to use the browser. The packaging states to visit the nintindo website to find the Original DS version, but I still have yet to locate a site that has two different browsers available.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow doesn't begin to describe it
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful when I bought this for my wife. Several attempts to make it worth our time and I realize it was an unfortunate waste of money. It is slower, far slower, than any speed modem I have ever used. This includes the old 2400 baud ones. In a strange turn for Nintendo, it seems they made a piece of junk with this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schroeter

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the A$$
customer_reviews.text: I like it to a point. I think that they should have maid it compatible with the original DS. I had to upgrade to the lite DS (witch I dont like as much) just to use it. If Nintendo was smart at all they would have made it compatible with the original. I am highly upset about that..
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: I need a cookie...
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have cookies and you're surfing the internet, it's really annoying. Still this is a neat little toy. Good at places like the doctor's office and the car dealership where you're trying to kill time. Airport too. You just have to keep re-entering your information since there is no memory of it.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: For Basic Browsing and E-Mail
customer_reviews.text: The DS Lite Browser is slow and does not render webpages well. It's ideal for a frequent traveler who needs a quick access to the web.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Browser for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: The DS Browser is a great tool for those times that you need to connect to the internet to quickly check something. It is of course not as fast as a regular computer but still very functional. I use it frequently to read books online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works...for some things...slowly
customer_reviews.text: i kinda knew what i was in for when i bought this. it's cool and clever and does what it's supposed to do. but it's reeeeeeeeally sloooooooooooow.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Collins

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding?
customer_reviews.text: bought it and took it back to eb games next day. pointless. considering how difficult it is to get the ds online with it's crappy WEP only (when nintendo can do an update but they don't care and don't want to), the browser seems like insult to injury with it's $30 price tag. you gotta be kidding? it's not a game, it's not worth $30, it's an update or value added NOT a release. nintendo is acting like microsoft (with the high failure rate of xbox 360s) and just trying to do as little possible to improve on a negative on this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Calson

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing! As long as the user/player is by a WiFi HotSpot, the product works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Winsome

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE STORES SELLING DS LITE VERSION FOR DS
customer_reviews.text: There are web-based stores who advertise a DS Browser on their website, sell you a DS Lite version when what you ordered was a DS version, and then will not accept a return as you have opened the box to determine that the Lite version will not fit in the DS.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Cool buy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why nintendo discontinued this product. i hope that they did it because they are designing a new better version of this one. but this will do just fine until nintendo releases a better one. maybe one that will include a flash media player.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos F. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Does what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't your home web browser. It woks as good as my Blackberry browser does. If you aren't expecting to do YouTube or something, its great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ds browser
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with this purchase! It did not come with the code to enter to use the browser. So, I was unable to even use this item! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: It is real waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It is real waste of money. I still ha e and anybody want one. I be glad to sell. But this product seems obseolrle. Because newer gameboy have better internet connection
customer_reviews.author: JeffM74

customer_reviews.title: ds browser
customer_reviews.text: when i first got i went on it a lot but it gos slow and but it was fun and i have i psp now internet's way better than ds browser.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bressman

customer_reviews.title: DS Browser
customer_reviews.text: This browser is not a built-in (have to purchase) and yet it does not work really well on most web sites. The speed is too slow compared to a wireless connection using B band (10 MB). It's not worth the money to buy and the effort to create this software.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Has very weak wireless security
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo DS Browser uses WEP encryption which is an early encryption method that is very easy to crack. It is worthless for securing a home network. If you are using WPA or WPA2 encryption on your home wireless network, do not buy the DS Browser because you will not be able to use these higher levels of security.
customer_reviews.author: Henry White

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The browser does not support the latest version of Adobe Flash. It only supports version 7.0 so many flash movies on the Internet (that use version 9) will not load! In other words, sites like [...] won't work!
customer_reviews.author: Wally Beck

customer_reviews.title: Does Amazon sell both versions?
customer_reviews.text: Does Amazon sell both versions or just the one for the ds lite?
customer_reviews.author: Allen M. Leibbrand

customer_reviews.title: Stupid to pay for a web browser.
customer_reviews.text: People who buy this title must be desperate. Nintendo is silly for charging for something thats already free on other resources. Yes I think it would be cool to have a browser on my DS, however to pay for it is disgusting me. I already have Three computers, a laptop, PSP, Mylo and a cell phone that all have browsers (at no extra cost). I doubt this browser can do anything special that other browsers cant do. Shame on Nintendo, Shame on those who make it easy for Nintendo to Take advantage of us by purchasing a silly product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: $30.00 for a broweser?
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to get this broweser. If I want to get on the net on the go I will use my PSP that came with a broweser *For free I might add* $30.00 for a web broweser that I can get on my Laptop and PC for free? What a ripoff. And if it is anything like the PSP broweser the loading on the browesers on handhelds are so dang slow. Don't buy this broweser for DS. Save up for a PSP instead! And for that matter I would rather waste my money on an actual DS game that is about the same price range. Like I said the broweser for DS is a RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Pinball Reviewer

product_meta.title: Nintendo DS Browser
product_meta.description: The Nintendo DS Lite Browser was co-developed by Nintendo and Opera and provides web browsing on the Nintendo DS Lite. The Opera browser software is stored on the Nintendo DS Lite cartridge, a memory expansion you can insert into the GBA slot. The browser uses both screens of the Nintendo DS Lite handheld. While the standard screen is displayed on the bottom, an expansion will be provided on the upper screen to provide a better browsing experience. Type your Web address on a keyboard display or using the DS stylus. A parent lock function is provided to disable the access to the internet for children.
feature_bullets: The Nintendo DS Lite version does not work with the original Nintendo DS system
Please NOTE: this item works on both DS and DS Lite browser but will NOT work on the newer DSi and DSi XL
